## Instant App 

 Android Developers Instant App  Google  Android ****Instant App  Instant App  Native App 4MB Google  Instnat App  10MB Sandbox 

## 

WebH5 Native App 

Instant App  Native App  Java/Kotlin  Instant  Native App 

## 

 Instant App  Instant App Instant App App  Instant App

 TapatalkVimeo Instant App  Play Store ( Instant App  Play Store ) 

![InstanApp-Case](/images/instant_app_cases.jpg)

## 

> Instant App Google

**->Google  Play Store->** Google Play  enable  Instant App  Instant App  Instant App **** Instant App

![Google-Instant-Switch](/images/instant_app_switch.jpg)
 
 Instant App

- Try Now Button in Play Store
Try Now Button **** Play Store  market Play Store  Try Now Button
- Browser
 Google Search  Instant App Manifest  hostpathPatternpathPrefix 
- Other
 TelegramGmail  Instant App Manifest  hostpathPatternpathPrefix 

![InstantApp-Install-From-Gmail](/images/instant_app_install_from_gmail.gif)

 Play Store  Instant App **->->Instant apps ** App  host

![Find-InstantApp-in-Setting](/images/find_instant_app_in_setting.jpg)

##
